decision_conditions: The proposal results in the loss of 3 trees protected by a Tree Preservation Order (TPO 391) which were shown to be retained in the original planning permission granted for the development of the site (Ref: 2645/APP/2016/4571) as varied by planning permission Ref: 2645/APP/2019/853 and the retention of which was assessed as a material matter in granting planning permission. As such the application is not the appropriate route in dealing with the loss of the trees.

The applicant is advised that the correct procedure should be to seek variation of Condition 2 of planning permission Ref: 2645/APP/2016/4571 dated 08/06/2017 (as amended by planning permission Ref: 2645/APP/2019/853 dated 08/05/2019 - Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission Ref: 2645/APP/2016/4571 (Two storey, 7-bed detached dwelling with habitable roof space, parking and amenity space involving demolition of existing dwelling)). Any such application will be assessed on its planning merits and this advice should not be taken as implying that permission will be forthcoming.
description: Details pursuant to condition 5 (Trees) of planning permission  Ref: 2645/APP/2016/4571 dated 08/06/2017 (Two storey, 7-bed detached dwelling with habitable roofspace, parking and amenity space involving demolition of existing dwelling)
